quote: People acting together as a group can accomplish things which no individual acting alone could ever hope to bring about. – Franklin D. Roosevelt
fact: Celery has negative calories! It takes more calories to eat a piece of celery than the celery has in it.
joke: Did you hear about the campsite that got visited by Bigfoot? It got in tents.
